verbose_text: Similar to JHMV infection, no differences in peripheral CD8 T cell expansion or expression of T cell derived IFN-gamma were detected between T. gondii infected IL-21 -/- and WT mice; however, during chronic infection loss of IL-21 reduced CNS derived T cell mediated IFN-gamma and IL-10 production arguing IL-21 to be essential for maintenance of local T cell responses in the CNS.
